scripts.dev: concurrently --handle-input --kill-others --kill-signal SIGINT --kill-timeout 5000 -n api,worker,web,admin -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "make api" "make worker" "make web" "make admin"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --handle-input --kill-others --kill-signal SIGINT --kill-timeout 5000 -n api,worker,web,admin -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "make api" "make worker" "make web" "make admin"
